scripts.typedoc: node node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --out ./docs/typedoc/ ./src/ --name sutoring --readme readme.md --includeDeclarations --exclude node_modules/typescript/**/*.d.ts --exclude node_modules/@types/**/*.d.ts -m commonjs
scripts.compile: tsc -p . && tsc -p ./examples/console/ts && tsc -p ./examples/browser && tsc -p ./debug/ts && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js
scripts.all: npm run compile && npm run typedoc && npm run custom
